data.meta_description: GABBY Giffords was building a successful political career until she resigned from her position due to an injury she sustained during an assassination
data.text:
GABBY Giffords was building a successful political career until she resigned from her position due to an injury she sustained during an assassination attempt.

She has championed various causes after her resignation from politics.

Who is Mark Kelly's wife, Gabby Giffords?

Gabrielle Giffords was born on June 8, 1970, in Tucson, Arizona.

Gabby is a retired politician and gun control advocate who served as a member of the United States House of Representatives for Arizona's 8th congressional district from 2007 to 2012, on behalf of the Democratic Party.

However, she resigned due to a severe brain injury she sustained after she was shot in the head in an assassination attempt and mass shooting just outside of Tuscon while she was at an event with constituents in January 2011.

Despite her traumatic experience, she has recovered much of her ability to speak, walk, read, and write.

Prior to that, she served in the Arizona House of Representatives from 2001 to 2003, and the Arizona Senate from 2003 to 2005 when she was elected to the US House of Representatives.

She was the third woman in Arizona's history to be elected to the US Congress.

On January 25, 2012, she formally submitted her resignation when she appeared on the floor of the House.

Gabby married Mark Kelly on November 10, 2007.

What did Gabby Giffords do after she resigned?

After she resigned from her post due to her brain injury, Gabby became an ardent advocate for anti-gun violence causes.

After the Sandy Hook Elementary School shooting in 2013, Gabby and her husband Mark founded the non-profit, Americans for Responsible Solutions to support pro-gun control candidates.

However, her non-profit was renamed Giffords in 2017.

On July 7, 2022, Gabby was awarded the Presidential Medal of Freedom by President Joe Biden.

What is her net worth?

According to Celebrity Net Worth, Gabby Giffords and Mark Kelly have an estimated net worth of approximately $20million, as of November 2022.

Their main source of wealth is said to be their career in politics.

They also earned income from book deals, business consulting, and corporate board memberships.
